sources.title: Flirtation (1934) Jeanette Loff Ben Alexander
sources.description: Jeanette Loff, Ben Alexander, Emma Dunn, and Corky the dog star in this 1934 pre-code romantic melodrama about a burlesque dancer and a country boy ~ You can see more Jeanette Loff at http://www.jeanetteloff.com

sources.title: Flirtation
sources.description: Title: Flirtation Summary: A precode romantic melodrama about a burlesque dancer and a country boy who must pretend to be married. Directed by: Leo Birinsky Actors: Jeanette Loff, Ben Alexander, Arthur Tracy Production Company: Salient Pictures Release Date: 9 November 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A precode romantic melodrama about a burlesque dancer and a country boy who must pretend to be married.

metadata.Plot: A precode romantic melodrama about a burlesque dancer and a country boy who must pretend to be married.
